1.content: It was like any other day, Dave was woke up and got ready for school. He ate his breakfast and went to his car. This day he was arriving to school an hour early when no one is there yet to get some school work done. He arrived at his school and went inside and sat on one of the comfortable chairs and started his work. After a little bit he started to feel sick and really tired, he then passed out on the chair
1.title: The start

choices: Kylie: 5”9 decent chest and biggest ass you have ever seen
12.content: After a while of being passed out he woke up to the sound of people walking by. He looked around at his surroundings. Alarmed he saw everything was huge, he must of been at least a centimeter tall. He looks down at his watch and sees that school is going to start soon. Right as he sees that people start rushing into the school. After a little bit he sees a shadow go over the chair, he looks up to see a giant ass about to sit on him. But you don’t know who it is.
12.title: What! I’m tiny!

121.content: You see the short brown hair and tight jeans which makes you figure out it’s your best friend Clara. You need to try to dodge her ass
121.title: Clara
